page.title: 07WEEKENDS
page.content:
I always look forward to a weekend because usually I have the whole Saturday to myself.But on a Sunday I get up, get dressed, go downstairs, have my breakfast and have a wash. Then I go out with my friend Clair and play Netball with her. We come back from Netball and go in for my best dinner, the Sunday dinner. After dinner I get changed for my Sunday dancing lessons.Me and Clair (my dancing partner) go down to a hall and dance.We practice for a whole hour and then we come home and rest and fall asleep. Thats roughly what I do on a Sunday.
By Amanda Pavitt. Aged 12
